issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement is_date function on Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12229](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12229). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Returns true if giventext is castable to a date of format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12229?focusedCommentId=17317279) by João Pedro Antunes Ferreira (jpedroantunes):*
Solved by the following Pull Request along with all new date holders added:

https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9877
